table.name: utilAccessMask
table.descr: Used to convert from people friendly mask names to values

table.name: utilCachedUntil
table.descr: Used to track cache times of the APIs

table.name: utilGraphic
table.descr: Used to maintain a list of graphics for registered chars and corps

table.name: utilRegisteredCharacter
table.descr: Used to maintain a list of characters that are registered with Yapeal to have their APIs gotten

table.name: utilRegisteredCorporation
table.descr: Used to maintain a list of corporations that are registered with Yapeal to have their APIs gotten

table.name: utilRegisteredKey
table.descr: Used to maintain a list of registered key IDs and secret code used with new custom API system

table.name: utilRegisteredUploader
table.descr: Used to register an upload destination site to an owner

table.name: utilSections
table.descr: Table used to allow admin control over which API will be available to registered user/char/corp also controls all other API sections

table.name: utilUploadDestination
table.descr: List of possible MarketOrder upload destinations

table.name: utilXmlCache
table.descr: Use to cache API XML if database cache is enabled

sql.query: ALTER TABLE `%%PutilGraphic` MODIFY `graphic` MEDIUMBLOB DEFAULT NULL
ALTER TABLE `%%PutilXmlCache` MODIFY `api` CHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE `%%PutilXmlCache` MODIFY `modified` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
ALTER TABLE `%%PutilXmlCache` MODIFY `hash` CHAR(40) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE `%%PutilXmlCache` MODIFY `xml` LONGTEXT
TRUNCATE `%%PutilAccessMask`
